overview: The story of a young writer who is in a negative and unconsciously destructive period of his life.  He is unable to cope with reality or to relate to other people without trying to use them, and loses his fiance and his friends. Through his interactions with various people, he finally discovers as long as he’s got his health and freedom, he’s got everything.
tagline: A nameless dude tried to beat the bummer!  But stacked against him were -- a virgin who wasn't!  A speed freak on wheels!  Weekend Indians copping out!  Reality!
title: Watch Out for the Bummer
